Name: Charentes
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Kummel's caraway flavours heavily influence this unusual cognac-based cocktail with Pineau des Charentes and lemon juice.
History: Created in 2015 by Tiarnan O'Gara at MASH, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Charentes contains 165 calories
